instruction: Create a story using the following words: backpack, balloon, and puppy.
output: Once there was a little girl who loved animals and she wanted to take her pet puppy with her everywhere she went. So, she found an old backpack and decided to turn it into a puppy pack. She filled it up with a few toys and snacks for the puppy and attached a colorful balloon to the top of the backpack. With that, the little girl and her puppy were ready for their next adventure!
